      • createFileOnDevice

        public static java.io.File createFileOnDevice(java.lang.String fileDirectory,
                                              java.lang.String fileName,
                                              boolean overwrite)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Create a blank file onthe device
        Parameters:
        fileDirectory - Directory the file will be placed in
        fileName - File name, including any extension
        overwrite - True to overwrite the file, if it already exists. False to return the file's instance instead.
        Returns:
        The file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception thrown if file cannot be created.
